Text: RE wrapup of todayMike MarkAnthoney has access to all the presentations on the O drive If you nneed a hard copy of my last presentation let me know Sorry about the late response Mike Original Message From Taylor Michael E Sent Mon PM To Mcquade Tom Childress Allen B Edwards Dan Moran Michael F Pack Jr Scott Rodriguez MarkAnthony Hatfield Jay Cc Woods Trevor Subject wrapup of today Thank you for your time today gentlemen I am attaching a copy of todays presentation that you got a hard copy of today Also Tom mentioned that your group put together a presentation in the past that included a list of holding companies and their plants Can someone please forward the presentations or the links to me I am in the process of updating my models Scott had given me a copy of his companies and plants which was very helpful If each of you have such a list I would benefit form it greatly I will let you guys respond to my request in the next week Then if I need more information on certain companies or plants I will try to contact the individual who covers those companies Thanks for all your help SO and NOxppt Michael Taylor Coal and Emissions Trading Enron Global Markets

Southeast CustomersMichael Listed below our the customers I cover undoubtedly the best covered territory represented by Enron Global Markets maybe Enron Corp Dominion Energy Formerly Virginia Power Progress Energy Carolina Formerly Carolina Power Light Progress Energy Florida Formerly Florida Power or Electric Fuels Corporation Duke Energy SC Electric Gas SC Public Service Authority Santee Cooper Jacksonville Electric Authority St Johns Power Park Gainsville Regional Utilities Orlando Utilities Commission Lakeland Electric Tampa Electric Seminole Electric Let me know if you need anything else Mike Mike Moran Manager Coal Marketing Enron Global Markets LLC Office Fax Mobile
